info.name: Riot chat light and compact
info.description: Improves the color contrast, hides avatars, puts usernames inline and make the chat-area full width.
info.additionalInfo:
I believe some of these changes could be in the default Riot theme. This user-style serves as a testing ground before making a pull request to the official theme.

This is meant to be used with the default light theme with the "compact" setting enabled.
